div.head: 諸蟲傷
div.div: all types of injury caused by bugs/worms

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: all types of injury caused by bugs/worms

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chong shang 蟲傷 , injury caused by bugs/worms. Pu ji fang 普濟方 306: 諸蟲傷，凡諸蟲齒所傷，其類不一 , “ All types of injury caused by bugs/ worms [refers to] all types of harm inflicted by the teeth of bugs/worms. There are many types of them”.
